content.p: Rack Focus Films Internship Programme Description: Rack Focus Films is a local documentary production company based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Rack Focus Films was one of the youngest production house when it started and today they were producing documentaries for international satellite television channels. Their last few documentaries, Al Maunah: The Malaysian Arms Heist and A Brotherhood of Bandits, were both aired on the Crime & Investigation Network channel and Al Maunah was also screened on the History channel. Rack Focus Films has just started pre-production on their new documentary series titled Motif: Inside the minds of crime and a few other documentary projects and are inviting interested interns to apply for internships. Internships will start on the month of May/June/July which is three months duration and the three months will give opportunities for interns for hands on training, working on documentary productions. Interns will receive a monthly allowance of RM400.00 during their internship from the company. Contact Details: Rob Nevis +6016 6855 816 Executive Producer E-mail: robnevis@yahoo.com Rack Focus Films Sdn Bhd B4 Taman Tunku Off Jln Langgak Tunku Bukit Tunku 50480 Kuala Lumpur Malaysia. How to apply: Students is encouraged to submit their application form and CV via their respective school and you can download the internship application form. The application form can also be submitted to Ms Kavitha at the FASS's Faculty Office via e-mail at Kavitha.Mariapan@nottingham.edu.my telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
